text: Dájúdájú Àwa (fi ìmísí) ránṣẹ́ sí ọ gẹ́gẹ́ bí A ṣe fi ránṣẹ́ sí (Ànábì) Nūh àti àwọn Ànábì (mìíràn) lẹ́yìn rẹ̀. A fi ìmísí ránṣẹ́ sí (àwọn Ànábì) ’Ibrọ̄hīm, ’Ismọ̄‘īl, ’Ishāƙ, Ya‘ƙūb àti àwọn àrọ́mọdọ́mọ (rẹ̀), àti (Ànábì) ‘Īsā, ’Ayyūb, Yūnus, Hārūn àti Sulaemọ̄n. A sì fún (Ànábì) Dāwūd ní Zabūr
